metadata.title: CVE-2024-43903 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Add NULL check for 'afb' before dereferencing inamdgpu_dm_plane_handle_cursor_updateThis commit adds a null check for the 'afb' variable in theamdgpu_dm_plane_handle_cursor_update function. Previously, 'afb' wasassumed to be null, but was used later in the code without a null check.This could potentially lead to a null pointer dereference.Fixes the below:drivers/gpu/drm/amd/amdgpu/../display/amdgpu_dm/amdgpu_dm_plane.c:1298amdgpu_dm_plane_handle_cursor_update() error: we previously assumed 'afb'could be null (see line 1252)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-43903` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-extra-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-13-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
